titleStmt.title: Letters written to J.M. a nonconformist teacher, concerning the gift and forms of prayer The second part. By Matthew Hole, B.D. sometime fellow of Exeter College, Oxon. now vicar of Stoke-gursey in Somersetshire.
Correct copy of some letters written to J.M. a nonconformist teacher, concerning the gift and forms of prayer. Part 2.
titleStmt.author: Hole, Matthew, 1639 or 40-1730.

titleStmt.title: Letters written to J.M. a nonconformist teacher, concerning the gift and forms of prayer The second part. By Matthew Hole, B.D. sometime fellow of Exeter College, Oxon. now vicar of Stoke-gursey in Somersetshire.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for, and are to be sold by J. Taylor, and T. Bever, booksellers in London; H. Clements in Oxon, and J. Miller in Sherborn, Dorset,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
